name: Finding Planet Earth
description:
A game made during #TrainJam2018 about exploring the galaxy as an alien collecting precious Human artifacts strewn across many worlds. Find your way to Earth and see whether your actions in the universe have an affect on your destination ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Controls

  • W - engine thrust
  • A - turn left
  • D - turn right
  • L - land when on planet

When on a planet, choose which ways you'd like to react and enjoy exploring the galaxy.

If you run out of fuel, watch out, or don't, we're ok with you doing you.

Credits:

  • Alexandria Heston (@ali_heston) - Art
  • David Helmer (@kidtsunami) - Programming
  • Ijke (@Ijke) - Design, Writing
  • Kurt Roembke (@spaceowlpro)- Music, Sound FX, and Sound Programming
  • Luca Redwood (@LuceRedwood) - Programming

Also:

Our artist posted a great thread about their process working with team on the game. Check it out here: https://twitter.com/ali_heston/status/975250075826896896

Oh and they put together a great postmortem https://realityofdesign.com/portfolio/game-design-and-art-finding-planet-earth/
